channel.title: CVE Feed for Yooslider -- Yoo Slider – Image Slider & Video Slider (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-25609|2024-09-17T00:40:33.669Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20image%20slider%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Yoo Slider – Image Slider & Video Slider (WordPress plugin) allows attackers with contributor or higher user role to inject the malicious code.
